name: The Miser
overview: Ebenezer Scrooge must perform a good deed to make up for his horrid existence, in fact he needs to perform 12 of them. Relive the struggles of Scrooge as he sets about his task. A task, which in his own eyes, was almost impossible. After all, it is bad enough that he should have to perform such deeds, but in order to do so he must first discover what the deeds actually are and how to perform them. Question everyone you pass, be observant and once you've finished your Herculean task, return to your nephew's house in order to finish the game.
